title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\UpdateMasterRequest
name: UpdateMasterRequest
description:
UpdateMasterRequest updates the master of the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.UpdateMasterRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to upgrade. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.master_version
params.description: Required. The Kubernetes version to change the master to. Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior: - "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version - "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version - "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version - "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version - "-": picks the default Kubernetes version

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster) of the cluster to update. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.

methods.name: getMasterVersion
methods.description:
Required. The Kubernetes version to change the master to.

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version
  • "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version
  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version
  • "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version
  • "-": picks the default Kubernetes version

Generated from protobuf field string master_version = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];

methods.name: setMasterVersion
methods.description:
Required. The Kubernetes version to change the master to.

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version
  • "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version
  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version
  • "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version
  • "-": picks the default Kubernetes version

Generated from protobuf field string master_version = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];

Users may specify either explicit versions offered by Kubernetes Engine or version aliases, which have the following behavior:

  • "latest": picks the highest valid Kubernetes version
  • "1.X": picks the highest valid patch+gke.N patch in the 1.X version
  • "1.X.Y": picks the highest valid gke.N patch in the 1.X.Y version
  • "1.X.Y-gke.N": picks an explicit Kubernetes version
  • "-": picks the default Kubernetes version
